description: Key events from Ancient Greek civilization

events.name: Foundation of Athens
events.description: Legendary founding of Athens by Theseus, establishing one of the most important city-states in ancient Greece

events.name: First Olympic Games
events.description: The first recorded Olympic Games held in Olympia, marking the beginning of a tradition that would last for over a millennium

events.name: Battle of Marathon
events.description: Decisive Athenian victory over the Persian Empire, ending the first Persian invasion of Greece

events.name: Construction of the Parthenon Begins
events.description: Beginning of construction of the Parthenon temple on the Athenian Acropolis, symbolizing the height of Greek architecture

events.name: Death of Alexander the Great
events.description: Death of Alexander the Great in Babylon, ending his vast empire and beginning the Hellenistic period
